name: Discomobulate - Fixed Edition
description:
This is a fighting strategy game, where every 10 seconds you have a new round. In each round first second is to decide you fighting strategy and 9 seconds is for fight itself! You have limited stamina, so decide your moves wisely, and ofcourse you can always skip move, in order to save stamina for further. 

This is fixed resolution game version and I might update and tweak this one, since the main entry is locked due to LDJam time cap.

Disclaimer:

GAME IS HARD.

Controls:

[Shift] - Block

[W] - Punch

[S] - Skip (save stamina)

[Space] - Discomobulate

[R] - Restart

Original version (submitted for LDJam51): https://oyshoboy.itch.io/discomobulate
